name: The Restart Ship
description:
After the Earth became uninhabitable , the remainder of the humankind decided to rebuild their civilization on another planet. To do that, they boarded the Restart Ship. 

During the landing sequence ,due to unforseen atmospheric conditions , every system on the ship began to fail. You will play as the Captain of the ship, guiding your crew to safety while exploring the ship and completing the necessary steps in order to fix the  ship`s system and land humanities new home.

You can download the game by clicking in this link as well, in the drive you click in TheRestartShipFinal.rar and download.

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/11Q3vFsqOtEv55ujX9K6KuyvbliXJXJmm?usp=sha...
